title: Hey is that new hero out yet?
body:
I just want to know because I will be rushing home from work to start testing her out!

please don't be toxic for me asking

replies.body:
The patch notes state that Kai'Sa will be released *with* patch 8.5, though when I logged onto the client earlier (around noon) she wasn't available in the store. If I remember correctly, it is sometimes the case that new champions will be unavailable for one or two days after the patch goes live.

Got to be honest, I really like the look of Kai'Sa, and am somewhat tempted to just put the money in to actually get her straight up, despite my better judgement...

EDIT: I checked just now and she still isn't appearing in the store.

I like the concept of her and already have around $100 worth of RP ready for the next event or w/e but will be buying everything she comes with. 

I know she cant be played for a couple of days in ranked after she's released but was hoping to use her on the practice tool :( 

thank you tho <3
